title: Slayken
subtitle: An intelligent search engine for clarity, speed, and control

sections.title: What is Slayken?
sections.text: Slayken is a modern search engine that independently indexes, analyzes, and searches websites. It is not a traditional browser, but a standalone search system with its own engine and data structure.

sections.title: Own Index Engine
sections.text: Slayken crawls websites, builds its own search index, and delivers lightning-fast, precise search results — independent of external search services.

sections.title: Tabs & Sessions
sections.text: Slayken features an intelligent tab system. You can create new tabs, switch between them, and view all open tabs in a dedicated overview. Each page is automatically saved as a screenshot, making it easy to recognize your active content.

sections.title: History & Favorites
sections.text: All visited pages are stored in your history. Important content can be marked as favorites, allowing quick access at any time.

sections.title: Global Search
sections.text: Global search scans not only the web, but also your tabs, history, and favorites — all within a single search field.

sections.title: Additional Features
sections.text: Slayken includes integrated weather displays, a clock view, and intelligent everyday search tools.

sections.title: Image-Based Search
sections.text: You can select photos from your gallery to automatically find similar images and related web content.

sections.title: Privacy & Control
sections.text: Your data remains under your control. Slayken works transparently, respects your privacy, and stores only what is necessary for your search features.

sections.title: About Slayken
sections.text:
Slayken is a modern search engine that independently indexes, analyzes, and searches websites.

It is not a traditional browser, but a standalone search system with its own crawling, indexing, and data engine.

Slayken allows you to:
• create and manage tabs
• switch between active sessions
• view all open pages with automatic screenshots
• store history and favorites
• use global search across web, tabs, history, and favorites
• view weather and clock widgets
• perform image-based searches from your photo library

Your data remains under your control. Slayken works transparently and privacy-first.
